race.name: Dwarf
race.age: Considered young until they're 50. Average lifespan of 350 years.
race.size: Medium. Between 4 and 5 feet tall and average 150 pounds.
race.perks: Darkvision, Dwarven Resilience, Dwarven Combat Training, Stonecunning.
race.proficiencies: Artisan's tools of choice (smith's, brewer's or mason's).

race.name: Elf
race.age: Physical maturity at the same age as humans. Full adulthood at around 100 years. Lifespan: Up to 750 years.
race.alignment: Usually Chaotic-Good. Drows lean towards evil.
race.size: Medium. From under 5 feet to over 6 feet tall. Slender build.
race.perks: Darkvision, Keen Senses, Fey Ancestry, Trance.

subrace.name: High
subrace.perks: Elf Weapon Training, Cantrip, Extra Language.

subrace.name: Wood
subrace.perks: Elf Weapon Training, Fleet Foot, Mask of the Wild.

subrace.name: Dark
subrace.perks: Superior Darkvision, Sunlight Sensitivity, Drow Magic, Drow Weapon Training.

race.name: Halfling
race.size: Small. About 3 feet tall and 40 pounds.

race.name: Human
race.age: Adulthood in their late teens. Average lifespan: Less than 100 years.
race.alignment: Humans tend to no particular alignment.
race.size: Medium. From 5 feet to 6 feet tall.

race.name: Dragonborn
race.age: Rapidly developing, they reach Adulthood around 15. Average lifespan: 80 years.
race.alignment: They tand to the extremes. Most are Good.
race.size: Medium. Well over 6 feet tall and an average 250 pounds.
race.perks: Draconic Ancestry, Breath Weapon, Damage Resistance.

race.name: Gnome
race.age: Adulthood around 40. Average lifespan: 350 to 500 years.
race.size: Small. Between 3 and 4 feet tall and an average 40 pounds.

subrace.name: Forest
subrace.perks: Natural Illusionist, Speak with Small Beasts.

race.name: Half-Elf
race.age: Adulthood around 20. Average lifespan: Over 180 years.
race.perks: Increase two stats of your choice by 1, Darkvision, Fey Ancestry, Skill Versatility.
race.languages: Common, Elvish and one other Language.

race.name: Half-Orc
race.age: Adulthood around 14. Average lifespan: Rarely longer than 75 years.
race.alignment: Usually Chaotic and not strongly inclined toward Good.
race.size: Medium. Between 5 and 6 feet tall. Bulkier than humans.
race.perks: Darkvision, Menacing, Relentless Endurance, Savage Attacks.

race.name: Tiefling
race.age: Adulthood around 20. Average lifespan: A bit longer than humans.
race.size: Medium. From 5 feet to 6 feet tall.

class.name: Barbarian
class.proficiencies: Light and Medium Armor, Simple and Martial Weapons.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception and Survival.
equipment: A greataxe or any martial melee weapon.
Two handaxes or any simple weapon.
An explorer's pack and 4 javelins.
class.features: Rage (lvl 1), Unarmored Defense (lvl 1), Reckless Attack (lvl 2), Danger Sense (lvl 2), Primal Path (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Extra Attack (lvl 5), Fast Movement (lvl 5), Path Feature (lvl 6, 10, 14), Feral Instinct (lvl 7), Brutal Critical (lvl 9, 13, 17), Relentless Rage (lvl 11), Persistent Rage (lvl 15), Indomitable Might (lvl 18), Primal Champion (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Path of the Berserker
subclass.features: Frenzy (lvl 3), Mindless Rage (lvl 6), Intimidating Presence (lvl 10), Retaliation (lvl 14).

subclass.name: Path of the Totem Warrior
subclass.features: Spirit Seeker (lvl 3), Totem Spirit (lvl 3), Aspect of the Beast (lvl 6), Spirit Walker (lvl 10), Totemic Attunement (lvl 14).

class.name: Bard
class.proficiencies: Light Armor, Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers and Shortswords, Three Musical Instruments.
equipment: A rapier or a longsword or any simple weapon.
A diplomat's pack or an entertainer's pack.
A lute or any musical instrument.
Leather armor and a dagger.
class.features: Spellcasting (lvl 1), Bardic Inspiration (lvl 1, 5, 10, 15), Jack of All Trades (lvl 2), Song of Rest (lvl 2, 9, 13, 17), Bard College (lvl 3), Expertise (lvl 3, 10), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Font of Inspiration (lvl 5), Countercharm (lvl 6), Bard College Feature (lvl 6, 14), Magical Secrets (lvl 10, 14, 18), Superior Inspiration (lvl 20).

subclass.name: College of Lore
subclass.features: Bonus Proficiencies (lvl 3), Cutting Words (lvl 3), Additional Magical Secrets (lvl 6), Peerless Skill (lvl 14).

subclass.name: College of Valor
subclass.features: Bonus Proficiencies (lvl 3), Combat Inspiration (lvl 3), Extra Attack (lvl 6), Battle Magic (lvl 14).

class.name: Cleric
class.proficiencies: Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields, All Simple Weapons.
class.skills: Choose 2 from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion.
equipment: A mace or a warhammer (if proficient).
A scale mail, leather armor o chain mail (if proficient).
A light crossbow and 20 bolts or any simple weapon.
A priest's pack or an explorer's pack.
A shield and a holy symbol.
class.features: Spellcasting (lvl 1), Divine Domain (lvl 1), Channel Divinity (lvl 2, 6, 18), Divine Domain Feature (lvl 2, 6, 8, 17), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Destroy Undead (lvl 5, 8, 11, 14, 17), Divine Intervention (lvl 10, 20).

subclass.name: Knowledge Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Blessings of Knowledge (lvl 1), Knowledge of the Ages (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), Read Thoughts (lvl 6; Channel Divinity), Potent Spellcasting (lvl 8), Visions of the Past (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Life Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Bonus Proficiency (lvl 1), Disciple of Life (lvl 1), Preserve Life (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), Blessed Healer (lvl 6), Divine Strike (lvl 8), Supreme Healing (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Light Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Bonus Cantrip (lvl 1), Warding Flare (lvl 1), Radiance of the Dawn (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), Improved Flare (lvl 6), Potent Spellcasting (lvl 8), Corona of Light (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Nature Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Bonus Proficiency (lvl 1), Acolyte of Nature (lvl 1), Charm Animals and Plants (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), Dampen Elements (lvl 6), Divine Strike (lvl 8), Master of Nature (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Tempest Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Bonus Proficiencies (lvl 1), Wrath of the Storm (lvl 1), Destructive Wrath (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), Thunderbolt Strike (lvl 6), Divine Strike (lvl 8), Stormborn (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Trickery Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Blessing of the Trickster (lvl 1), Invoke Duplicity (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), Cloak of Shadows (lvl 6; Channel Divinity), Divine Strike (lvl 8), Improved Duplicity (lvl 17).

subclass.name: War Domain
subclass.features: Special Spells (lvl 1, 3, 5, 7, 9), Bonus Proficiencies (lvl 1), War Priest (lvl 1), Guided Strike (lvl 2; Channel Divinity), War God's Blessing (lvl 6; Channel Divinity), Divine Strike (lvl 8), Avatar of Battle (lvl 17).

class.name: Druid
class.proficiencies: Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields (druids will not wear armor or use shields made of metal); Clubs, Daggers, Darts, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaffs, Scimitars, Sickles, Slings, Spears and Herbalism Kit.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Arcana, Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, and Survival.
equipment: A wooden shield or any simple weapon.
A scimitar or any simple melee weapon.
Leather armor, an explorer's pack, and a druidic focus.
class.features: Druidic (lvl 1), Spellcasting (lvl 1), Wild Shape (lvl 2, 4, 8), Druidic Circle (lvl 2), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Druidic Circle Feature (lvl 6, 10, 14), Timeless Body (lvl 18), Beast Spells (lvl 18), Archdruid (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Circle of the Land
subclass.features: Bonus Cantrip (lvl 2), Natural Recovery (lvl 2), Circle Spells (lvl 3, 5, 7, 9), Land's Stride (lvl 6), Nature's Ward (lvl 10), Nature's Sanctuary (lvl 14).

subclass.name: Circle of the Moon
subclass.features: Combat Wild Shape (lvl 2), Circle Forms (lvl 2), Primal Strike (lvl 6), Elemental Wild Shape (lvl 10), Thousand Forms (lvl 14).

class.name: Fighter
class.proficiencies: All Armor, Shields, Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, and Survival.
equipment: A chain mail or leather armor, longbow and 20 arrows.
A martial weapon and a shield or two martial weapons.
A light crossbow and 20 bolts or two handaxes.
A dungeoneer's pack or an explorer's pack.
class.features: Fighting Style (lvl 1), Second Wind (lvl 1), Action Surge (lvl 2, 16), Martial Archetype (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 6, 8, 12, 14, 16, 19), Extra Attack (lvl 5, 11, 20), Martial Archetype Feature (lvl 7, 10, 15, 18), Indomitable (lvl 9, 13, 17).

subclass.name: Champion
subclass.features: Improved Critical (lvl 3), Remarkable Athlete (lvl 7), Aditional Fighting Style (lvl 10), Superior Critical (lvl 15), Survivor (lvl 18).

subclass.name: Battle Master
subclass.features: Combat Superiority (lvl 3), Student of War (lvl 3), Know Your Enemy (lvl 7), Improved Combat Superiority (lvl 10, 18), Relentless (lvl 15).

subclass.name: Eldritch Knight
subclass.features: Spellcasting (lvl 3), Weapon Bond (lvl 3), War Magic (lvl 7), Eldritch Strike (lvl 10), Arcane Charge (lvl 15), Improved War Magic (lvl 18).

class.name: Monk
class.proficiencies: Simple Weapons, Shortswords, one type of Artisan's Tools or one Musical Instrument.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, and Stealth.
equipment: A shortsword or any simple weapon.
A dungeoneer's pack or an explorer's pack.
10 darts.
class.features: Unarmored Defense (lvl 1), Martial Arts (lvl 1), Ki (lvl 2), Unarmored Movement (lvl 2, 9), Monastic Tradition (lvl 3), Deflect Missiles (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Slow Fall (lvl 4), Extra Attack (lvl 5), Stunning Strike (lvl 5), Ki-Empowered Strikes (lvl 6), Monastic Tradition Feature (lvl 6, 11, 17), Evasion (lvl 7), Stillness of Mind (lvl 7), Purity of Body (lvl 10), Tongue of the Sun and Moon (lvl 13), Diamond Soul (lvl 14), Timeless Body (lvl 15), Empty Body (lvl 18), Perfect Self (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Way of the Open Hand
subclass.features: Open Hand Technique (lvl 3), Wholeness of Body (lvl 6), Tranquility (lvl 11), Quivering Palm (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Way of Shadow
subclass.features: Shadow Arts (lvl 3), Shadow Step (lvl 6), Cloak of Shadows (lvl 11), Opportunist (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Way of the Four Elements
subclass.features: Disciple of the Elements (lvl 3, 6, 11, 17).

class.name: Paladin
class.proficiencies: All Armor, Shields, Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion.
equipment: A martial weapon and a shield or two martial weapons.
Five javelins or any simple melee weapon.
A priest's pack or an explorer's pack.
Chain mail and a holy symbol.
class.features: Divine Sense (lvl 1), Lay on Hands (lv 1), Fighting Style (lvl 2), Spellcasting (lvl 2), Divine Smite (lvl 2, 11), Divine Health (lvl 3), Sacred Oath (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Extra Attack (lvl 5), Aura of Protection (lv 6), Sacred Oath Feature (lvl 7,  15, 20), Aura of Courage (lvl 10), Cleansing Touch (lvl 14), Aura Improvements (lvl 18).

subclass.name: Oath of Devotion
subclass.features: Oath Spells (lvl 3, 5, 9, 13, 17), Channel Divinity (lvl 3), Aura of Devotion (lvl 7, 18), Purity of Spirit (lvl 15), Holy Nimbus (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Oath of the Ancients
subclass.features: Oath Spells (lvl 3, 5, 9, 13, 17), Channel Divinity (lvl 3), Aura of Warding (lvl 7, 18), Undying Sentinel (lvl 15), Elder Champion (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Oath of Vengeance
subclass.features: Oath Spells (lvl 3, 5, 9, 13, 17), Channel Divinity (lvl 3), Relentless Avenger (lvl 7), Soul of Vengeance (lvl 15), Avenging Angel (lvl 20).

class.name: Ranger
class.proficiencies: Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields, Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons.
class.skills: Choose 3 from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival.
equipment: Scale mail or leather armor.
Two shortswords or two simple melee weapons.
A dungeoneers's pack or an explorer's pack.
A longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows.
class.features: Favored Enemy (lvl 1, 6, 14), Natural Explorer (lvl 1, 6, 10), Fighting Style (lvl 2), Spellcasting (lvl 2), Ranger Archetype (lvl 3), Primeval Awareness (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Extra Attack (lvl 5), Ranger Archetype Feature(lvl 7, 11, 15), Land's Stride (lvl 8), Hide in Plain Sight (lvl 10), Vanish (lvl 14), Feral Senses (lvl 18), Foe Slayer (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Hunter
subclass.features: Hunter's Prey (lvl 3), Defensive Tactics (lvl 7), Multiattack (lvl 11), Superior Hunter's Defense (lvl 15).

subclass.name: Beast Master
subclass.features: Ranger's Companion (lvl 3), Exceptional Training (lvl 7), Bestial Fury (lvl 11), Share Spells (lvl 15).

class.name: Rogue
class.proficiencies: Light Armor, Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords, Thieve's Tools.
class.skills: Choose 4 from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
equipment: A rapier or a short sword.
A shortbow and a quiver of 20 arrows or a shortsword.
A burglar's pack, a dungeoneers's pack or an explorer's pack.
Leather armor, two daggers and thieve's tools.
class.features: Expertise (lvl 1, 6), Sneak Attack (lvl 1), Thieve's Cant (lvl 1), Cunning Action (lvl 2), Roguish Archetype (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, 19), Uncanny Dodge (lvl 5), Evasion (lvl 7), Roguis Archetype Feature (lvl 9, 13, 17), Reliable Talent (lvl 11), Blindsense (lvl 14), Slippery Mind (lvl 15), Elusive (lvl 18), Stroke of Luck (20).

subclass.name: Thief
subclass.features: Fast Hands (lvl 3), Second-Story Work (lvl 3), Supreme Sneak (lvl 9), Use Magic Device (lvl 13), Thief's Reflexes (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Assassin
subclass.features: Bonus Proficiencies (lvl 3), Assassinate (lvl 3), Infiltration Expertise (lvl 9), Impostor (lvl 13), Death Strike (lvl 17).

subclass.name: Arcane Trickster
subclass.features: Spellcasting (lvl 3), Mage Hand Legerdemain (lvl 3), Magical Ambush (lvl 9), Versatile Trickster (lvl 13), Spell Thief (lvl 17).

class.name: Sorcerer
class.proficiencies: Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, and Religion.
equipment: A light crossbow and 20 bolts or any simple weapon.
A component pouch or an arcane focus.
A dungeoneers's pack or an explorer's pack.
Two daggers.
class.features: Spellcasting (lvl 1), Sorcerous Origin (lvl 1), Font of Magic (lvl 2), Metamagic (lvl 3, 10, 17), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Sorcerous Origin Feature (lvl 6, 14, 18), Sorcerous Restoration (lvl 20).

subclass.name: Draconinc Bloodline
subclass.features: Dragon Ancestor (lvl 1), Draconic Resilience (lvl 1), Elemental Affinity (lvl 6), Dragon Wnigs (lvl 14), Draconic Presence (lvl 18).

subclass.name: Wild Magic
subclass.features: Wild Magic Surge (lvl 1), Tides of Chaos (lvl 1), Bend Luck (lvl 6), Controlled Chaos (lvl 14), Spell Bombardment (lvl 18).

class.name: Warlock
class.skills: Choose 2 from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
equipment: A light crossbow and 20 bolts or any simple weapon.
A component pouch or an arcane focus.
A scholar's pack or a dungeoneers's pack.
Leather armor, any simple weapon, and two daggers.
class.features: Otherworldly Patron (lvl 1), Pact Magic (lvl 1), Eldritch Invocations (lvl 2), Pact Boon (lvl 3), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Otherworldly Patron Feature (lvl 6, 10, 14), Mystic Arcanum (lvl 11, 13, 15, 17), Eldritch Master (lvl 20).

subclass.name: The Archfey
subclass.features: Expanded Spell List (lvl 1), Fey Presence (lvl 1), Misty Escape (lvl 6), Beguiling Defenses (lvl 10), Dark Delirium (lvl 14).

subclass.name: The Fiend
subclass.features: Expanded Spell List (lvl 1), Dark One's Blessing (lvl 1), Dark One's Own Luck (lvl 6), Fiendish Resilience (lvl 10), Hurl Through Hell (lvl 14).

subclass.name: The Great Old One
subclass.features: Expanded Spell List (lvl 1), Awakened Mind (lvl 1), Entropic Ward (lvl 6), Thought Shield (lvl 10), Create Thrall (lvl 14).

class.name: Wizard
class.proficiencies: Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows.
class.skills: Choose 2 from Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, and Religion.
equipment: A quarterstaff or a dagger.
A component pouch or an arcane focus.
A scholar's pack or an explorers's pack.
A spellbook.
class.features: Spellcasting (lvl 1), Arcane Recovery (lvl 1), Arcane Tradition (lvl 2), Ability Score Improvement (lvl 4, 8, 12, 16, 19), Arcane Tradition Feature (lvl 6, 10, 14), Spell Mastery (lvl 18), Signature Spell (lvl 18).

subclass.name: School of Abjuration
subclass.features: Abjuration Savant (lvl 2), Arcane Ward (lvl 2), Projected Ward (lvl 6), Improved Abjuration (lvl 10), Spell Resistance (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Conjuration
subclass.features: Conjuration Savant (lvl 2), Minor Conjuration (lvl 2), Bening Transposition (lvl 6), Focused Conjuration (lvl 10), Durable Summons (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Divination
subclass.features: Divination Savant (lvl 2), Portent (lvl 2), Expert Divination (lvl 6), The Third Eye (lvl 10), Greater Portent (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Enchantment
subclass.features: Enchantment Savant (lvl 2), Hypnotic Gaze (lvl 2), Instinctive Charm (lvl 6), Split Enchantment (lvl 10), Alter Memories (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Evocation
subclass.features: Evocation Savant (lvl 2), Sculpt Spells (lvl 2), Potent Cantrip (lvl 6), Empowered Evocation (lvl 10), Overchannel (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Illusion
subclass.features: Illusion Savant (lvl 2), Improved Minor Illusion (lvl 2), Malleable Illusions (lvl 6), Illusory Self (lvl 10), Illusory Reality (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Necromancy
subclass.features: Necromancy Savant (lvl 2), Grim Harvest (lvl 2), Unded Thralls (lvl 6), Inured to Undeath (lvl 10), Command Undead (lvl 14).

subclass.name: School of Transmutation
subclass.features: Transmutation Savant (lvl 2), Minor Alchemy (lvl 2), Transmuter's Stone (lvl 6), Shapechanger (lvl 10), Master Transmuter (lvl 14).

background.name: Acolyte
background.equipment: A holy symbol (a gift to you when you entered the priesthood), a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15gp.

background.name: Charlatan
background.equipment: A set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, tools of the con of your choice (ten sttopered bottles filled with colored liquid, a set of weighted dice, a deck, of marked cards, or a signet ring of an imaginary duke), and a belt pouch containing 15gp.

background.name: Criminal
background.toolProficiencies: One type of gaming set, thieve's tools.
background.equipment: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 15gp.

background.name: Entertainer
background.toolProficiencies: Disguise kit, one type of musical instrument.
background.equipment: A musical instrument (one of your choice), the favor of an admirer (leve letter, lock of hair, or trinket), a costume, and a belt pouch containing 15gp.

background.name: Folk Hero
background.toolProficiencies: One type of artisan's tools, vehicle (land).
background.equipment: A set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10gp.

background.name: Guild Artisan
background.equipment: A set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a letter of introduction from your guild, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15gp.

background.name: Hermit
background.equipment: A scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, a herbalism kit, and 5gp.

background.name: Noble
background.equipment: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 25gp.

background.name: Outlander
background.equipment: A staff, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt containing 10gp.

background.name: Sage
background.equipment: A bottle of black ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, and a belt containing 10gp.

background.name: Sailor
background.equipment: A belaying pin (club), 50 feet of silk rope, a lucky charm such as a rabbit foot or a small stone with a hole in the center (or you may roll for a random trinket on the trinkets table in chapter 5), a set of common clothes, and a belt containing 10gp.

background.name: Soldier
background.toolProficiencies: One type of gaming set, vehicles (land).
background.equipment: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy (a dagger, a broken blade, or a piece of a banner), a set of bone dice or a deck of cards, a set of common clothes, and a belt containing 10gp.

background.name: Urchin
background.equipment: A small knife, a map of the city you grew up in, a pet mouse, a token to remember your parents by, a set of common clothes, and a belt containing 10gp.
